Pre-Game Insights: The Guardians take on the Rays at Progressive Field.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game will be played at 1:40 p.m. ET at Progressive Field.
The game will be broadcast on Bally Sports Great Lakes, WTAM 1100 AM, WMMS 100.7 FM, and the Guardians Radio Network.
Others: The Guardians are 85-64, while the Rays are 73-76.
